title: Fact Check: This picture is NOT of doctors and nurse who died in Italy; here’s the truth | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
A picture of some people lying on the street is being shared with a claim that 17 doctors and nurses had died in Italy.

“17 Docters n nersus died yesterday in italy whith the others 739 died pray for italy bros n sis,” the caption read.

Link to the above post.

ALSO READ: These pictures of people stranded on streets with medical equipment are…

NewsMobile fact-checked the above post and found the claim to be false.

On putting the image through Reverse Image Search, we found that it is an AFP picture from Bogota, Colombia.

The caption of the image ina report by Arab Time read, “Youngsters wearing protective suits take part in a performance as part of an awareness campaign against the spread of the new coronavirus, COVID-19, in Bogota on March 18, 2020. (AFP)”

We also found a tweet by AFP dated March 19, where they shared the same picture along with some others.

The above information proves that this picture is not from Italy.

If you want to fact-check any story, WhatsApp it now on +91 88268 00707
